Name: Bitches Brew
Ingredients: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: This flavoursome flip-style drink comes served with a hint of Caribbean spice.
History: Created in 2008 by Daniel Eun at PDT in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Bitches Brew contains 296 calories
